response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed over years of research and innovation. This product is not just a tool; it's an investment that can significantly enhance efficiency and productivity in your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering its immense potential impact on your business, I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a game-changing asset at a premium rate before we explore other options. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable addition to your company a reality.", "product_price": 15000}
